name: main

definition.annotation: Metagenomic analysis, from raw reads to gene catalog. Uses Megahit to assemble contigs and Prodgial to predict CDSs on contigs to provide the gene catalog. Finally, functional, taxonomic, and antimicrobial resistance information is provided.
definition.name: Metagenomic Genes Catalogue Analysis

24.name: Genes catalogue AMR specific part

subworkflow.name: Genes catalogue AMR specific part
subworkflow.readme:
This workflow is only activated if **the Boolean selected in the gene catalog workflow is False**, which means that the user don't want a complete gene catalog but **specific AMR**.

This workflow takes the tabular outputs from **ABRicate, starAMR, and argNorm for AMRFinderPlus** as input. It also uses the **Prodigal** output corresponding to the FASTA file of the DNA sequences of the potential genes detected.

Based on the outputs from the antibiotic resistance detection tools and Prodigal, this sub-workflow has two objectives:

* The workflow retrieves the IDs of the contigs on which antibiotic resistance has been detected (with the CDS information still on them),

Then:
* It retrieves all the CDSs corresponding to these ARGs and then clusters them in the main workflow

And:
* At the same time, it removes the CDS information and creates a single list of contig IDs.
* It then retrieves all the CDSs that have been detected on the same contig IDs so that it can then functionally and taxonomically annotate the genes close to the ARGs in the main workflow.

readme:
# Genes catalogue generation from metagenomic reads

This workflow generates genes catalogue from paired short reads.

The workflow supports assembly using **MEGAHIT** and assembly quality control via **QUAST**.

## Genes catalogue Annotation and Quality Control

After assembly, CDS are detected from resulting contigs with **Prodigal** 

Then, depending on your choice of Boolean, this will lead to two different analyses :

If the **Boolean is True** for the complete genes catalog:

All the potential genes are clustered with **MMseqs2linclust**

The following processing steps are then performed on the full clustered genes catalogue :

- **Genes annotation** with Eggnog-mapper
- **Taxonomic Assignment** using MMseqs2taxonomy
- **Abundance Estimation** per sample with CoverM
- **AMR detection** with ABRicate, AMRFinderPlus and starAMR

If the **Boolean is False** for the complete genes catalog, a specific focus is placed on the functions and taxonomies associated with contigs on which an antibiotic resistance gene is detected.

This will initiate the construction of a genes catalogue specific to **antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs)**.

1. **AMR detection** with ABRicate, AMRFinderPlus and starAMR is performed on CDS predicted with **Prodigal.**
2. **Taxonomic and functional annotation** will be performed on CDSs present on the same contig as the ARGs catalogue.
3. **Clustering** is then performed on the detected ARGs, followed by **coverage** of this clustered ARGs catalog with the sample reads.

## Input Requirements

Input reads must be quality-filtered, with host reads removed.

- **Trimmed reads**: Quality-trimmed reads from individual samples, used solely for abundance estimation.
changelog:
# Changelog

## [1.2] - 2025-01-13

### Automatic update

* `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/recetox/table_pandas_rename_column/table_pandas_rename_column/2.2.3+galaxy0` should be updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/recetox/table_pandas_rename_column/table_pandas_rename_column/2.2.3+galaxy1`

### Added

* Addition of a Boolean variable allowing users to choose whether users want a full genes catalog analysis or one specific to antibiotic resistance.
* Added a workflow to retrieve the contig IDs and CDSs of antibiotic resistance genes, and to filter genes present on the same contigs as antibiotic resistance genes (if the Boolean value is False).

## [1.1] - 2025-12-08

### Automatic update

- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_cat/9.5+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_cat/9.5+galaxy2`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.5+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/bgruening/text_processing/tp_awk_tool/9.5+galaxy2`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/seqkit_translate/seqkit_translate/2.10.0+galaxy0` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/seqkit_translate/seqkit_translate/2.12.0+galaxy0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/krakentools_kreport2krona/krakentools_kreport2krona/1.2+galaxy2` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/krakentools_kreport2krona/krakentools_kreport2krona/1.2.1+galaxy0`

## [1.0] - 2025-10-14

- First release
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1050 570" role="img" aria-label="Metagenomic Genes Catalogue Analysis workflow diagram">
  <title>Metagenomic Genes Catalogue Analysis</title>
  <desc>Metagenomics pipeline from raw reads to gene catalogue: MEGAHIT assembly, Prodigal CDS prediction, MMseqs2 clustering, functional annotation with eggNOG, taxonomic classification, and AMR gene detection</desc>
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>
  <rect width="1050" height="570" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="1050" height="570" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="1050" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Metagenomic Genes Catalogue Analysis</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Reads -> MEGAHIT -->
  <path d="M 180 115 C 230 115, 230 110, 280 110" class="connection"/>
  <!-- MEGAHIT -> QUAST -->
  <path d="M 480 100 C 510 100, 500 65, 530 65" class="connection-qc"/>
  <!-- MEGAHIT -> Prodigal -->
  <path d="M 480 120 C 520 120, 510 190, 530 190" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Prodigal -> MMseqs2 -->
  <path d="M 730 190 C 760 190, 750 110, 780 110" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Prodigal -> AMRFinderPlus -->
  <path d="M 730 200 C 760 200, 750 310, 780 310" class="connection"/>
  <!-- MMseqs2 -> eggNOG -->
  <path d="M 980 110 C 1000 110, 840 395, 780 395" class="connection"/>
  <!-- MMseqs2 -> Taxonomy -->
  <path d="M 980 120 C 1010 120, 1010 200, 780 200" class="connection-secondary"/>
  <!-- AMRFinderPlus -> ARG Catalogue -->
  <path d="M 980 310 C 1010 310, 1000 310, 870 310" class="connection"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODE -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,70)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Trimmed Reads</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Paired metagenomics reads</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">after QC</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODES -->
  <!-- MEGAHIT -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(280,70)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MEGAHIT Assembly</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Assemble reads into</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">metagenomic contigs</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- QUAST -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(530,55)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="130" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="130" height="22" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="130" height="11" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="8" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">QUAST</text>
    <text x="8" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Assembly quality metrics</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Prodigal -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(530,150)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>

    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Predict coding sequences</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">(CDS) on contigs</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- MMseqs2 -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(780,70)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MMseqs2 Clustering</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Cluster gene sequences</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">into catalogue</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- AMRFinderPlus -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(780,270)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">AMRFinderPlus</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Detect antimicrobial</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">resistance genes</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- eggNOG -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(780,355)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>

  <!-- MMseqs2 Taxonomy -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(780,170)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>

    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Taxonomic classification</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">of gene clusters</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <g transform="translate(530,260)">

  <g transform="translate(530,330)">

  <!-- MultiQC -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(280,460)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="70" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#10b981"/>

    <circle cx="0" cy="35" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(20,530)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="1010" height="35" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.9"/>

    <text x="432" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Report/QC</text>
